name: Baldi's Basic's Advanced 0.0.1
description:
Welcome to Baldi's Basics Advanced!
A new and improved version of the classic Baldi's Basics! (This mod is NOT trying to mimic any other mod that's changing the layout of the school and/or add new characters)

What is this? WHY is this?
This mod is gonna be HUGE! Every new update will feature : 
-New rooms, hallways, characters, items etc...

This first version is not that special, i know, but every update will have HUGE changes!

What are the new characters?
For now, there are no new characters in the mod, they'll appear in the next update, BUT, their sprites are already in the game files, so if you'll want to, you can check them out ;)

Character list :
-Baldi
-Playtime
-Principal of the thing
-Gotta Sweep
-1st Prize
-Arts and Crafters

New characters list (Coming Soon) :
-Jessica (Coming Soon)
-Lonard (Coming Soon)
-Teethie (Coming Soon)
